name: XBattle
description: XBattle is a realtime multiplayer actiongame. You can fight with mechs and other players

name: Your Spider
description: Your Spider is a 1st/3rd person horror game. Solve unique puzzles and work together with your spider to defeat formidable monsters, which do not like humans or spiders.

name: Ascended Survivor
description: Ascend to the Earth's surface in this vertical shmup! Punch, shoot, and grab enemies both mechanical and natural in your unique ship in this brutally hard vertical shooter.

name: The Kungfu Scrolls
description: A roguelike deckbuilding game based on Chinese mythology. You can collect over 100 kinds of cards to develop your deck. Fight with various monsters and aim to defeat the last boss.

name: Metallophobia
description: Metallophobia is a dystopian roguelike top-down shooter. Each playthrough is a new procedurally generated map, with unique designs and challenges. Upgrade your robot with new guns and modules as you progress, and create your own unique build.

name: Search of Galaxy
description: After the supernova explosion, the Thermian race was destroyed. All knowledge, technologies and data about the past were lost. You must to restore civilization and explore the territories of your home system in search of lost technologies and artifacts.

name: MageCosmos
description: MageCosmos is a VR platform for global users to meet, play and discover together. We have immersive multiplayer games with interesting themes like fly simulation, farming, tower defense...This is also a place for you and friend to relax yourselves, it's definitely worth your visting !

name: Cyberpunk Samurai VR
description: Cyberpunk Samurai is a built-for-VR PVP and single-player fighting game with real-time, physics-driven melee combat. Combat is fast-paced, tactical, and brutal.

name: Only Evil Remains
description: Only Evil Remains is a psychological horror, multiplayer shooter which takes place in an early post apocalyptic world where dreams become nightmares and only evil remain.

name: Rift Blade
description: Choose between Luck or Chance and save the multiverse!

name: If the Dream of Star
description: If The Dream Of Star is an Asian-language tour attacking and dodging with music, which is a game centered around "psychology". This is a virtual world, where people are carefree but completely happy. Is it really happy?

name: Drip Drop
description: Relive your childhood wonder...In this late 80s early 90s inspired epic 2D platformer! Jump over powerful monsters, run over crumbling bridges, and save the one you love in 5 wacky worlds!

name: Base Dune
description: Base Dune 3D is a first-person shooter in which you have to go through a large secret laboratory destroying enemies. You can simply move around the game world and shoot the weapons that are given in the game.

name: Matachin
description: Matachin, is a 2D video game of Metroidvania-type platforms, with digital illustration and its own music from the Pasto region in Colombia. Your goal is embark on a fantastic adventure full of mysteries for rescue a whole town from sadness releasing the spirit of carnival.

name: Old Stories: Fireheart
description: You play as an adventurer, who got stranded on the island called "Keron". Assemble other adventuers and take them in your party, defeat monsters, fulfill quests, get stronger and defeat the 'Fire worshippers'.

name: Money Movers 3: Guard Duty
description: You and your dog need to help each other in order to capture the criminals!

name: Winter and People
description: The cold is brutal. To protect your people and yourself, you must fight both the cold and your enemies. You will never die to the cold nor your enemies. You will resist, for your people and for yourself. Winter and People is a survival/tower defense game.

name: Rules: Politically Incorrect
description: In this crazy world you are becoming a leader of democracy and your task will be to maintain a balance between development, budget, equality and power. Choose whether you prefer to be seen as a brutal capitalist or a gentle social democrat. Your choices will be written on the pages of history.

name: Captain Soda
description: Captain Soda is a charming soda-themed arcade arena shooter about refreshing chemical warfare. Wield weaponized soft drinks to defend earth from waves of invading aliens!

name: The Last of Samual
description: Welcome to a new galaxy! You are Samual, a simple farmer that lives in a small abandoned town called First Valley. You live there with your daughter Sam who is the light of your world. One day you are attacked and your daughter is taken away from you!

name: Cubey's Adventure
description: You play as Cubey, who is a Cube. Use your Cubeyness to escape various situations and become the ultimate cube (you are the only cube either way).

name: Guns and Roses
description: Guns and Roses is a first-person shooter adventure game. In the game, you play the role of a battle-hardened veteran, hired by the beautiful girls' peace organization "Black Rose" to help them destroy the terrorist organization (Grey Parliament).

name: Kanpeki
description: Dragged into her own mind, A fashion obsessed high-schooler must escape a twisted version of her rural hometown. She explores empty streets and abandoned buildings as a mysterious light in the distant forest watches over her. A horror game about perfectionism.

name: Escape from Cronos X
description: Escape from Cronos X is a top-down, action RPG, with a deep storyline and epic battles. Fight your way through many action-packed missions to explore Cronos and find a way to escape the planet.

name: Achromatic
description:
Rummage through the rooms, find objects, papers, compare them to what the notebook gives you, and try to analyze it all. In Achromatic, your deduction will be your best ally.

Immerse yourself in a dark mood, tributing the Film Noir cinema genre: black and white graphics on your computer, colors on your notebook, lighting games, muffled mood, jazz music and more.

name: Deadoxer
description: This is a small horror game in which you have to escape.

name: Shadows of Glory
description: Shadows of Glory is a free-to-play online roman gladiator combat multiplayer game for PC.

name: Hearts & Hexes
description: Hearts & Hexes is a romance visual novel where you play as Sabrina who is attending a Halloween party for the first time in her life. The goal is to break out of your shell, make new friends, and experience the magic that is Halloween!

name: Mariposa and the Galaxy Man
description: Welcome to the world of Mariposa and the Galaxy Man, a story-rich stylized 3D platformer set in a galaxy with colorful planets based on different decades of the 1900s. Save space creatures, platform precarious places, solve physics-based puzzles, and interact with fun characters as you zoom across the galaxy to save a man made of stars.

name: Knight of the Living Dead
description:
A precise platformer inspired by Legend of Zelda 2 and Jump King.
You are a returning knight from the past, now setting off to seek revenge for the kingdom. But many years have passed, and you are now unfamiliar with the changed world.

name: PokéSmash
description: Pokémon Smash or Pass. A simple concept, brought to popularity by Youtuber Markiplier.

name: Chosung Quiz
description: It is an initial consonant quiz and a game made for Koreans.

name: Building Hope: Refugee Camp Simulator
description: Building Hope: Refugee Camp Simulator is a refugee camp building and management game. Refugee camps are the only hope for the ones who have had to leave their homes, and your duty is to provide them with a safe environment. Remember, there is no one way to run a refugee camp!

name: Soul Split
description: Soul Split is a PSX styled action rogue-lite dungeon crawler following an amnesiac sorcerer who’s previous actions broke the cycle of life and death. Conscripted into the service of Death itself, you’ll delve into a vast dungeon overflowing with magic and monsters to “clean up your mess.”

name: Mendalos
description: Mendalos is an oldschool RPG focusing on exploring and finding clues in order to solve puzzles to get further into the depths of the dungeon. But beware... there are a lot of traps and dangerous foes lurking in the shadows.

name: Rolling Over It
description: Help a cute armadillo get to the top of the mountain in this point and click simulation game.

name: Dreaming Rainbow
description: This is a horror game where you walk through the 3D hospital space and solve mysteries. You will experience a nurse day in the nurse's view. Mysterious phenomena occur frequently. Through the experience, the truth comes to light.

name: Hamster Blitz!
description: Hamster Blitz! is a wave defense game where you and up to 3 other friends work together to defend your household from waves of devious rats.

name: Z-Rush Survival
description: Survive in your Virtual Reality (VR) space in this Horror-Thriller based shooting Game. Stay alive by shooting down Zombies that surround you at 360 degree angle.

name: Ardenfall
description: Ardenfall is a first-person RPG set in a world of intricate politics and ancient cultures. Explore rain-drenched wetlands and forgotten dungeons full of danger. Meet countless interesting characters with unique dialog and quests, and leave your mark on this mysterious world.

name: Swing the Universe
description: Use a grappling hook to discover different colorful and soothing environments. Easy to learn, hard to master, this game will let you progress at your own pace!

name: Agony Online
description: Agony Online is the world's first ever mix of MMORPG & 10,000 Player Battle Royale on a monumental scale that is made by independent developers that want to play their own game. Players can choose to join Battle Royale, or continue playing the Horror MMORPG.

name: Duels
description: Duels is a high energy RPG PVP game, but with a difference: the unique auto-battle system means anybody can play and fight monsters. Choose your favorite medieval fighter/warrior, use the weapons, and prepare for epic multiplayer clan arena battles online! Want to challenge yourself further? Enter the dungeons at your peril and fight your way through hordes of cool and dangerous monsters.

name: Spiritlink Tactics
description: Spiritlink Tactics is a story driven, tactical turn-based RPG. Lead your party of mercenaries through strategic battles! Customize each party member with numerous classes and skills!

name: Koi Iro Rabian Doll
description: Sin descripción

name: Koi wa Alf Laylah
description:
There was once a lone princess in a kingdom surrounded by a desert far, far away. She'd simply be beautiful if she kept silent but most of the time she was a tsundere. As if to hide her tender nature deep in her heart, she was a tomboy always doing whatever she wanted. At such a princess' side was her loyal manservant.

Spoiled by and dependent on her servant, the princess lived a peaceful life, free and uncontrolled.
Until one day, her father declared:

"You will marry the prince of our neighboring kingdom."

Unsurprisingly, the princess didn't accept such a sudden declaration of marriage.

"I will never, ever get married!!"

So, this tsundere princess...
Was to meet the prince to arrange their marriage.
And by her side was her loyal servant.

From where will the flower of love bloom...!?

name: Les Grandes Odalisques
description:
This is the tale of Alexia, a princess, and Eli, a female military cadet—two best friends who have grown up supporting each other through thick and thin.

Our story begins as the First World War looms over a small European country. One day, a central diplomatic figure sends Alexia as an envoy to a great nation in the East: Anatolia, a large and fearsome empire that once threatened all of Europe.

There, the two women come face-to-face with the concubines of the Imperial Harem hidden deep within the palace... an event that sets an entirely new destiny into motion.

Torn between their duty and their hearts' true desires, what will they choose—and what will they leave behind?

name: Special Operation 85: Hostage Rescue
description: Two young Iranian nuclear scientists, Saeed and his wife Maryam, are kidnapped by US military forces while on a religious pilgrimage to Karbala, Iraq, and are sent to a prison in Israel. Bahram Nasseri, an Iranian special operations agent, is sent to Israel to save the scientists and four other Iranians. While in Israel, Nasseri also exposes an Israeli-Iranian responsible for leaking classified information about Iran's nuclear program to Western powers. The name of Nasseri's mission is "The Special Operation".

name: Quest of Persia: Lotfali Khan Zand
description: The story happens in the 17th century when the Agha Mohammad Khan Ghajar controls the north and central part of Iran. After Lotfali Khan Zand has been betrayed by his minister Ebrahim Kalantar and loses his capital Shiraz, he decides to take the fortress close to the capitol called Zarghan and make it his command center. Little that he knew Ebrahim Kalantar, and Agha Mohammad Khan Ghajar prepared a huge assault on Zarghan. He escapes to Kerman, where the second part of the game takes place...

name: Quest of Persia: The End of Innocence
description: The story begins with Iraq attacking Iran from the air, sea and land. Arashk who is an engineer working in Petrochemical plant, gets caught in the attacks, and has to escape the factory while it's burning into ashes. He meets Leyla an archeologist who is working in the desert. She is trying to find out the secrets of Ancient Persian Sites. Together they have to fight the Iraqi Invasion army, while trying to solve the mystery of Ancient Sites. Arashk and Leyla find a manuscript which provides them with information about secrets of Ancient Persian Sites. It gives them a clue about the famous battle of Agha Mohammad Khan Ghajar and Lotfali Khan Zand.

name: Darkwaronline
description: Darkwaronline is a sci-fi RPG game the game was designed mainly as MMORPG where you drive your chosen robot, it can be manually or with the automated combat system.

name: Sockpuppet Noire
description: Step into the shoes of Frank Sockowski, private detective, and explore the gritty world of New Drawer, a wolly unsettling and corrupt city.

name: Birding Simulator
description: Birding Simulator is a first-person photography-exploration game. Get your camera ready, adjust parameters, and gear up to capture unique and rare bird species. Explore varied landscapes and catch the best moments in your photos. Become the best birder in the world!

name: Turbo Driving Racing 3D
description: Conquer street and sky in Turbo Driving Racing, a mix of high-octane driving and endless racing. Barrel through packed streets, avoid crashes, take down traffic cars, pick up coins and perform dynamic, high-speed aerial stunts! The game will challenge even the most skilled racing fans.

name: Catafalque
description: Catafalque is a first-person survival horror game. Inspired by the masterpieces of the PSOne era, this is a love letter to games of yore. The game is portrayed through simple yet detailed retro graphics carefully arranged with the complexity and depth of modern games, mixed with hardcore and unforgiving, yet fair, mechanics. Explore the unfamiliar world around you, filled with details and secrets to uncover, while engaging in rewarding exploration to uncover the deep lore of this wicked universe.

name: Try Harder
description: Sprint headlong into certain death and put your mobile reflexes to the test.

name: Down the Deep
description:
In this game, you can feel like an undper, and most importantly stay alive!

Here you should pay attention to almost everything! Control your oxygen level, watch out for obstacles, do not bump into walls. And remember: Keep Up!

name: Racing Drift
description:
This game still has something to show, and it will definitely surprise you...
By the way, you should get used to the way cars are moving here :)

Good Luck and remember to have fun!

name: SkyRider
description: SkyRider is a 2 player co-op action puzzle platformer game. One player will control Noki, jumping, fighting and collecting energy for his drone. The other one will control that drone: "R.O.B.O.T.O", making platforms, energy shields and shooting.

name: NecroNightmare
description:
You're in your house, but you've been home alone for days, you decide to enter into the mysterious basement.

You find a mysterious book, strange things will happen.

name: Tsos
description: Tsos is an indie survival horror game made for the HauntedPS1 "Summer Of Shivers" gamejam. A gamepad is recommended for a better experience.

name: Surviving the Humans
description: Surviving the Humans is a 2D point-and-click adventure-style video game. Face the humans, who will seek to eliminate you in any way, while you learn what it is to be a zombie.

name: Serial Hunter
description: Serial Hunter, an action-adventure thriller, invites you into the twisted mind of the self-proclaimed avenger. Play as John Doe, an investigative journalist who uses information gathered at work to rid the public of the most degenerate individuals. And the cleansing methods are very diverse... As an investigative journalist, you have access to many tools that allow you to track down the incarnate evil. Use police frequency monitoring, whistleblower services and connection to municipal surveillance to establish the identity and whereabouts of your target. Only then will you plan a perfect execution.

name: Lost Away
description: Lost Away is a first-person survival action game set light-years away from our solar system. After a spaceship crash, the protagonists find themselves the lone survivors on a mysterious planet where nothing is quite as it seems. Use all of your tools, tech and skills to set a base camp, discover the planet's previously undiscovered secrets and return to Earth alive.

name: God Simulator
description:
God Simulator is an Economic Strategy-Simulation Game, putting you in charge of, well, the entire world!

Become an omnipotent observer in this holyrious adventure and decide the fate of all those who inhabit the world, through a powerful control panel that receives everyone’s prayers. What kind of God will you become - will you hear their pleas and pilot this planet to a paramount of peacefulness or will you take a step back, letting Earth erode into ultimate chaos?

name: Boardwalk Memories
description: Enjoy a casual stroll on the boardwalk and play some classic boardwalk games, including the always popular Fascination.

name: Lost Continent
description:
Lost continent is a MMORPG, reminiscent of the great classic.

Play in synchronous real-time players from different places and experience the adventure on the Lost Continent from anywhere, anytime.

name: Cats!
description: Sin descripción

name: Blob Boy
description: Roll, Bounce, and Swing your way to the top of the mountain in this 3d momentum-based precision platformer! Be warned, this game is not for the faint of heart! You will fail, many... many times! Are you up to the challenge?

name: Skimming Canoe
description: Skimming canoe is a fast-paced action game where your reaction time is key. The aim of the game is to survive as long as you can without getting hit buy the rocks to get the highest score possible. You can collect coins along the way which can be used in the shop to buy even more cool canoes. We have many game modes such as original, arena mode, ranked and even an online multiplayer mode!

name: Commit Arson Now
description: Cute Kitten Game

name: Hellgate: London FPS
description: Sin descripción

name: Scrabble Sprint
description: Sin descripción

name: Grand Theft Auto: Montevideo City
description: Sin descripción

name: Boom Bears on Stream
description: Auto-Battler Battle Royale for Twitch Chat! Let your viewers fight it out on stream.

name: Dead Town: Zombie Survival
description: Dead Town: Zombie Survival is a hardcore zombie shooting survival game where you have to survive in the dead town. You can craft, cook, and make your own base. Survive as long as you can.

name: Parachute Drop
description: Parachute Drop is a game where you drop your character and try to land on the center of the target! Set channel points cost to automatically create a drop redemption or type drop or your custom command into your channel chat.

name: Mario Kart Wii
description:
Mario Kart Wii is an enhanced port of the Wii game under the same name) released only in China for the Nvidia Shield console. It was part of a batch of Nintendo games released for the console in a collaboration of Nintendo and Nvidia, in 1080p and with gameplay adapted to work without the need of motion controls.

All of the Nintendo games released in this deal ran on special versions of the emulator Dolphin, which made possible all of the changes applied.

This port was never released.

name: Just Shoot
description: Shooting game in an arena with lots of enemies and upgrades to collect! The game takes place in an environment where the player must use his weapons to eliminate enemies and complete the mission eliminating the final boss.

name: Digital Monster Ver GBs
description: Digital Monster Ver GBs is a fantasy RPG where the main focus is to care for a digital monster. This is primarily done by feeding, training, cleaning up after it and making sure the it gets enough rest. The quality of care given will have an affect on it's evolution path. As time passes and care requirements are met, the monster will evolve. Each monster will have multiple evolution options available to it. Each versions has 40+ unique monsters.

name: Insecure: The Come Up Game
description: Based on the hit show Insecure, Insecure: The Come Up Game is a mobile life simulation game in which players rap battle their way into a life in LA. The game features the main characters from the show Insecure as the new crew for the player, a deck-building based rap battle system, and dynamic narratives.

name: Mosey the Pirate
description:
Mosey the Pirate is the official Flying Spaghetti Monster action-adventure role-playing game, with the titular Mosey, a Pirate from the FSM canon, as the story's protagonist! Follow Mosey on the adventure that is his life, as he rises from being another lowly, down-on-his-luck short-order cook under the cruel employ of Phil the Night Manager, to becoming the world’s first Pirate, one of the chosen, holiest, and most chill people of the Flying Spaghetti Monster.

Explore an open satirical variant of the ancient Mediterranean, craft an assortment of useful items, manage your own crew as the captain of the mighty Lasagna, combat all sorts of hilariously devious enemeis, and discover the true meaning of being a Pirate!

name: Homecoming: Morenatsu Revisited
description:
A remake of the classic Japanese visual novel Morenatsu.

In "Homecoming", you take on the role of a young Japanese snow fox named Hiroyuki Nishimura. After moving away from your hometown Minasato to Osaka five years ago, you receive an unexpected letter from an old friend inviting you back for one last summer vacation before completing your senior year of high school. What complicates things is how you've neglected to contact any of your friends over the years. Although nervous, you accept the invitation.

What awaits you back in Minasato? Will you be welcomed with open arms, or has it been so long that everyone has forgotten about you? Will this be yet another wasted summer, or will you finally have the chance to experience what makes life worth living?

Homecoming is a visual novel about nostalgia, romance, living life to the fullest, reconnecting with old friends, and learning to face your demons, all wrapped up in the cute Japanese kemono aesthetic. The game Homecoming is based on, Morenatsu, is considered to be one of the classic entries in furry culture. Although it was canceled in 2015, dedicated fans have continued to keep its legacy alive through fanworks such as this.

While rough around the edges, the original game captured many hearts, including the members of the Stormsinger Studios development team. Stormsinger is aiming to create the best visual novel they can make: addressing and changing questionable aspects of the original while doing justice to the source material that has inspired so many.

name: Santa Lucia
description:
A college-themed, slice-of-life & mystery visual novel with a supernatural twist.

In “Santa Lucia”, you take on the role of a young cat named Ben in his first semester at the University of Santa Lucia. As a child, Ben was prone to crippling headaches and blackouts. One night in his first year of high school, these pains culminated in a terrifying nightmare, which marked the beginning of recurring night terrors which have plagued his life ever since then.

Still, Ben manages to maintain an optimistic view of life, looking forward to the change of pace university has to offer. As you experience Ben's first semester, you'll encounter a wide cast of colorful characters, several of whom you'll be able to pursue a romantic relationship with. However, some nights Ben still has those headaches which caused him so much grief growing up. Will you be able to live your first semester of university to the fullest, or will the pains eventually overwhelm you?

name: Derelicts
description: After crashing on Earth with a space shuttle, you and your friends have to start from scratch. Explore and build a base, then defend it against mutated animals and humans. Find the origin of the defense mechanism that triggered a wave of radiations on Earth, forcing the most privileged part of mankind to go and live on space stations.

name: Botborgs
description: The Borgverse is a Sci-fi themed multiplayer game built on a multi-planetary system.

name: Infinity Skies
description: In Infinity Skies, players build a castle on a floating island in the sky from the ground up, using various building components such as walls, floors and furniture. It is then possible to visit other players castle to socialize, make friends and ultimately vote on the best castles so that they can compete in a grand build-competition! Build components are NFTs that can primarily be obtained by playing the Infinity Skies: Immemorial Chronicles Hack-and-slash game.

name: Protagoras Bleeds
description: Protagas Bleeds is a classic 90’s style survival horror game set in a mysterious motel filled with grotesque abominations and TV-headed monsters.

name: Blazing Worldstars
description: Fast Paced, 2D sprite fighting action! Blazing Worldstars is a furry themed fighting game with 90s arcade flavor!

name: tmOD
description: Cursed love letter/demake on classic GMod and the hl2 modding scene, with a poetry based sandbox/exploration narrative hinting at some burrowed evil.

name: Starburst Waterslide Slalom
description: Get to the bottom of the waterslide as quickly as you can! Use the arrow keys to guide your character towards candy along the slide.

name: Apolysis
description: Apolysis is a third-person, atmospheric narrative. Play as a runaway, called to the husk of an old refinery by the seductive goddess that inhabits it. Face your fear and transcend the flesh.

name: Lucky Fight vs. Ika Musume 3X
description: Developed by D.C.S. with collaboration from mokonaXVI.

name: I Wanna Eat the Lemon
description: A short "I Wanna Be The Guy" fangame with an emphasis on "Needle" platforming and being beginner friendly.

name: Zombie frenzy
description: In the game, players will play the role of survivors and arrive safely in the safety room to win.

name: Bounty: Five O
description: Bounty: Five-O is inspired by early 2000's racing games. Race on the street or on the track to earn money. Upgrade your cars to keep up with the competition and complete your vehicle collection with the hottest cars and challenge the police to earn the highest bounty.

name: Late For Class: Variety King
description: Use 9 different movement mechanics to overcome challenges on your way to school. Late for Class is a tribute to games that test your skills and dedication to the max. Expect lots of falling and getting back up!

name: Unstable
description: UNSTABLE is a 3D action runner with spaceship flight simulation. Handle unique keyboard controls to avoid asteroids! Disintegrate obstacles with a plasma laser weapon! And get to the mysterious unknown! Will you master the chaos of an unstable spaceship?

name: Immersion
description: There is no escape. The only end is death. Stay alive as long as you can, run away from monster, complete floors full of enemies and challenges.

name: Voice
description: Voice is a game about the story of living in a dystopian world where speaking is forbidden.

name: Box Rush
description: The Magic Kingdom was attacked by fantastic monsters who erected siege structures around the entire island.

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Spooky Rush Ep. 6
description: Halloween is coming! Paint by numbers and take portraits of mythical characters!

description: Halloween is coming! Paint by numbers and take portraits of mythical characters!

description: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! Paint by numbers and immerse yourself in a fairy atmosphere!

description: Welcome to the water world! Paint by numbers and uncover the secrets of the oceans!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Spirit of Christmas Ep. 4
description: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! Paint by numbers and immerse yourself in a fairy atmosphere!

description: Halloween is coming! Paint by numbers and take portraits of mythical characters!
